## Color4.add() method

Creates a new Color4 set with the added values of the current Color4 and of the given one

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(right: Color4): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  right | <code>Color4</code> | defines the second operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

a new Color4 object
